00031 /*uint32*/
00032 #define EOL_Red         0xDD0000
00033 #define EOL_Green       0x00DD00

00105 typedef struct
00106 {
00107   eolUint           xRes;           
00108   eolUint           yRes;

00110   eolUint           aMask;

00116   GLint             viewPort[4];    
00117   GLdouble          modelView[16];  
00118   GLdouble          projection[16]; 
00119 }eolGraphicsView;
